body_html: Thanks @concretevitamin, that worked great. The only quibble I have is that the TransformGraph tool is not included in the TensorFlow pip package so I had to add it to the PYTHONPATH. Do you know if optimize_for_inference_lib is to be removed from the pip package and if TransformGraph is to be added to the pip package?
body_text: Thanks @concretevitamin, that worked great. The only quibble I have is that the TransformGraph tool is not included in the TensorFlow pip package so I had to add it to the PYTHONPATH. Do you know if optimize_for_inference_lib is to be removed from the pip package and if TransformGraph is to be added to the pip package?
body: Thanks @concretevitamin, that worked great. The only quibble I have is that the `TransformGraph` tool is not included in the TensorFlow pip package so I had to add it to the `PYTHONPATH`. Do you know if `optimize_for_inference_lib` is to be removed from the pip package and if `TransformGraph` is to be added to the pip package?
